description: This column is the unique identifier for each candidate in the database table. It is used as the primary key to uniquely identify each candidate record.

examples: Candidate has strong communication skills, would be a good fit for the sales position.
Interviewed candidate, very knowledgeable about marketing strategies.
Candidate's application missing references, follow up needed.
Noticed candidate has experience with CRM software, could be beneficial for the role.
Candidate reached out with updated resume, needs to schedule an interview.
Met candidate at job fair, interested in learning more about the company culture.
Candidate requested feedback on interview performance, schedule feedback session.
Noted candidate's salary expectations are within our budget limits.
Candidate has experience with social media marketing, stand out skill.
Excellent teamwork demonstrated during group interview.
Candidate mentioned looking for remote work opportunities, consider for future positions.
Candidate has a gap in employment, inquire about reasons during next interaction.
Received positive reference from candidate's previous manager.
Candidate mentioned interest in professional development opportunities, discuss available options.
Impressed by candidate's portfolio, definitely a strong contender for the position.
Candidate has leadership experience, potential for advancement within the company.
Candidate has valid certifications in relevant field, adds credibility to application.
Noted candidate's location is far from office, consider remote work options.
Candidate expressed interest in company values, aligns well with our mission.
Candidate has excellent time management skills, important for role with tight deadlines.
description: This column is for storing notes related to candidates in the context of managing job postings, candidates, personas, process groups, process steps, and process step templates.

This column is about storing the file key or reference to the CV (resume) of a candidate applying for a job. This allows the system to associate a candidate's CV file with their profile information in the database.

This column is about keeping track of the current step or stage in the recruitment process for a candidate in the job posting management system. It likely stores an identifier or reference to the specific step or stage the candidate is currently at in their application process.
This column is the unique identifier for each job posting in the database table.

examples: Marketing Manager at a Fortune 500 Company
Legal Assistant at a Law Firm
Chef de Cuisine - Fine Dining Restaurant
description: This column is about storing the title of a job posting in the database table. It is specifically used to hold the title of the job that is being posted as part of the job management system.

examples: Looking for a software engineer with 5+ years of experience in Java programming.
We are hiring a marketing manager with strong experience in digital marketing and content creation.
Seeking a customer service representative who is fluent in Spanish and has excellent communication skills.
Join our team as a project manager and lead cross-functional teams to successful project completion.
Exciting opportunity for a data scientist to work on cutting-edge machine learning projects.
We are seeking a creative graphic designer with a passion for visual storytelling.
Looking for a sales executive with a proven track record of exceeding sales targets.
Join our company as a financial analyst and help drive business decisions through data insights.
We are hiring a product manager to oversee the development of new software products.
Seeking a human resources coordinator with experience in recruitment and employee relations.
Join our team as a UX/UI designer and help create engaging and user-friendly interfaces.
Looking for a content writer with SEO knowledge to create compelling website content.
Exciting opportunity for a software QA engineer to ensure the quality of our products.
We are seeking a social media specialist to manage our online presence and engagement.
Join our company as a business development manager and drive growth through strategic partnerships.
Seeking a legal assistant to support our legal team with administrative tasks.
Looking for a healthcare administrator with experience in managing medical facilities.
Join our team as a customer success manager and ensure client satisfaction and retention.
Exciting opportunity for a network engineer to design and implement network solutions.
We are seeking a supply chain manager to optimize our supply chain processes and logistics.
Looking for a research analyst with strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
description: This column is about the description of job postings. It contains details and information about the job position, responsibilities, requirements, and any other relevant information related to the job posting.
This column is about storing the LinkedIn URL associated with a specific job posting. It may be used to provide more information about the company or job position advertised in the job posting.
This column is about storing the unique identifier (ID) of the personas in the system. Each persona will have a distinct ID for identification and reference purposes.
This column is about storing the name of a persona in the context of managing job postings, candidates, personas, process groups, process steps, and process step templates.

This column contains the surnames of the personas associated with the project. Personas are fictional characters that represent the different user types or target audience for the job postings and candidates being managed in the project.

This column is about capturing the location information of a specific persona within the context of managing job postings, candidates, personas, process groups, process steps, and process step templates.
This column contains the email address of the persona (individual) associated with the job postings and candidates in the project.
This column is about storing the LinkedIn URL of a persona. It is used to link a persona's professional profile on LinkedIn to their profile in the database.
This column is about storing the unique identifier (ID) of process groups in the system for managing job postings, candidates, personas, process groups, process steps, and process step templates.
This column is about storing the names of process groups in the context of managing job postings, candidates, personas, process groups, process steps, and process step templates.
This column is about uniquely identifying process steps within the project's process management system.

examples: Review and approve the design mockup before proceeding.
Discuss potential risks with the team before implementing the new feature.
The client has requested a change in the color scheme for the UI.
Update the project timeline due to unexpected delays in the development phase.
Reminder: QA testing for the latest feature update is scheduled for tomorrow.
Please notify stakeholders about the upcoming project demonstration.
Refer to the project management guidelines for best practices in cost estimation.
Document the feedback received from the user testing session.
Follow up with the vendor regarding the delivery schedule for the required equipment.
Include the latest project progress in the weekly status report.
Clarify the scope of work for the next iteration with the product owner.
Review the meeting minutes from the last stakeholder meeting for action items.
Prepare a contingency plan in case of system downtime during the deployment.
Ensure all team members are aware of the change in the project milestone dates.
Highlight key dependencies for the upcoming sprint planning meeting.
Request approval from the client before implementing the additional feature requests.
Address the performance issues reported by the end-users in the latest release.
Update the task board with the current status of each user story.
Schedule a knowledge sharing session to discuss the new technology stack.
Organize a retrospective meeting to evaluate the team's performance in the current sprint.
description: This column is about storing notes related to a specific process step in the project management system. The notes may include details, instructions, comments, or any additional information relevant to that particular process step.
This column is an identifier for each unique process step template in the database table.
This column is about storing the name of a process step template in the public schema of the database.
